title: How to unsubscribe from EdEra
description: Based on the information available, there are several companies with similar names. Please identify which 'EdEra' service you are using to follow the appropriate cancellation steps. If you are referring to Hedera (HBAR), it is a blockchain network and there is no subscription to cancel. If you are referring to EDERA S.r.l., it offers voluntary and free subscription to their services. If you are referring to Edera, Inc. (edera.dev), Edera L3C, or Edera AI, specific cancellation steps were not found.

steps_1.title: General Instructions
steps_1.description:
* Identify which 'EdEra' service you are using.
* If using Hedera (HBAR), and referring to an exchange account, close your account on that exchange.
* If using EDERA S.r.l., leave the channel you subscribed to.
* If using Edera, Inc. (edera.dev), send an email to support@edera.dev to discontinue communications.
* If using Edera L3C or Edera AI, further information is needed to provide cancellation steps.

steps_2.title: Data Erasure Request via Email
steps_2.description:
* If using EDERA S.r.l., contact privacy@edera.it to have your data deleted.
* For data erasure requests for Edera, Inc. (edera.dev), send an email to contact@edera.dev.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your EdEra subscription. Step-by-step instructions for unsubscribing from various EdEra services, including Hedera (HBAR), EDERA S.r.l., and Edera, Inc. (edera.dev). Find out how to close your account, leave channels, and request data deletion.
